content:
Prev: Casa Batlló at night, I Up: Casa Batlló Next: Casa Batlló at night, III

Casa Batlló at night, II



With this lighting, the balconies take on the appearance of skulls and the second floor pillars look like they are made of giant bones.
Taken Sunday, September 09, 2001, 10:27:55pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 928kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/40s @ F3.2, ISO 320, 78mm
